data.title: Parking Around KL Sentral, Brickfields (Parking Rates & Distance)
data.meta_description: There are a total of 9 parking choices around KL Sentral (Brickfields area), of which 3 are indoor parking and 6 are outdoor parking. Indoor Parking around KL Sentral areaLet’s [Read more...]
data.text:
There are a total of 9 parking choices around KL Sentral (Brickfields area), of which 3 are indoor parking and 6 are outdoor parking.

Indoor Parking around KL Sentral area

Let’s start with the indoor parking in the KL Sentral area.

KL Sentral Indoor Parking Lot

The KL Sentral Parking Lot is the closest indoor parking bay you can find in the area. It is the best choice for those who want to drop off or pick up passengers at KL Sentral because the first 15 minutes drive through is free of charge.

It costs RM4 for the first hour and RM4 for the subsequent hour thereof. There is no flat rate or maximum rate, thus be aware that the parking fee could be very expensive if you are going to park for long hours. Read more

TimingParking RateFirst 15 Minutes Drive ThroughFREE1st Hour or Part ThereofRM4Subsequent 1 Hour or Part ThereofRM4

NU Sentral Parking Zone B

The NU Sentral Indoor Parking Lot is located just next to KL Sentral and it is the best indoor parking choice if you are going to parking more than an hour.

It costs RM5 for the first hour and RM2 for the subsequent hour thereof. If you want to park overnight on weekdays, make sure you reach there after 6 pm, it will only cost you RM5 flat rate from 6 pm to 6 am. On Saturday, Sunday and public holidays, you can park there for RM 5 for the whole day. Read more

TimingParking Rate1st Hour or Part ThereofRM5Subsequent 1 Hour or Part ThereofRM2Weekdays 6 pm to 6 amRM5 flat rateSaturday, Sunday & Public HolidaysRM5 flat rate

Kompleks TLK Brickfields Indoor Parking

The indoor parking bay of Kompleks TLK Brickfields is further away from the KL Sentral. It is located at Jalan Berhala and about 9 minutes walk to KL Sentral.

It costs RM3 for the first hour and RM1 for the subsequent hour thereof. Maximum rate per day is kept at RM10. Monthly parking pass also available for RM250 (random parking) and RM350 (reserved parking).

TimingParking Rate1st Hour or Part ThereofRM3Subsequent 1 Hour or Part ThereofRM1Maximum Rate Per DayRM10Monthly Pass (Random)RM250Monthly Pass (Reserved)RM350

Outdoor Parking around KL Sentral area

Other than the three parking bays above, the other available parking lots are outdoors (no cover). Thus, if you don’t mind the sunshine and rain, you can probably park at these locations.

Poslaju Public Carpark

The Poslaju Public Carpark is an outdoor autopay carpark and located just next to Poslaju office. The Post office is located next to the NU Sentral Mall where you can walk through the mall to KL Sentral.

It is free for the first half an hour and costs RM3 for the first hour and RM2 for the subsequent hour thereof. If you park there in between 5 pm to 12 am, it will only cost you RM5 flat rate.

TimingParking RateFirst 30 MinutesFREE1st Hour or Part ThereofRM3Subsequent 1 Hour or Part ThereofRM2Per Entry After 5 pm to 12 amRM5 flat rate

KL Sentral Lot F Parking by Semasa Parking

KL Sentral Lot F Parking is an outdoor carpark managed by Semasa Parking located near KL Sentral basement bus terminal where the buses depart.

The first 15 minutes drive through is free. It costs RM3 for the first hour and RM3 for the subsequent hour thereof. If you want to park overnight on weekdays, make sure you reach there after 6 pm, it will only cost you RM5 flat rate from 6 pm to 6 am. On Saturday, Sunday and public holidays, you can park there for RM 5 for the whole day.

TimingParking RateFirst 15 Minutes Drive ThroughFREE1st Hour or Part ThereofRM3Subsequent 1 Hour or Part ThereofRM3Weekdays 6 pm to 6 amRM5 flat rateSaturday, Sunday & Public HolidaysRM5 flat rate

Carpark Opposite Poslaju by Asiapark

There is another outdoor carpark option located just opposite Poslaju Carpark managed by Asiapark.

It costs RM4 for the first hour and RM4 for the subsequent hour thereof. If you park there after 5 pm, it will only cost you RM7 flat rate.

TimingParking Rate1st Hour or Part ThereofRM4Subsequent 1 Hour or Part ThereofRM4Per Entry After 5 pmRM7 flat rate

Parksafe Outdoor Carpark Jalan Sultan Abdul Samad

Parksafe Outdoor Carpark is located along Jalan Sultan Abdul Samad and is about 7 minutes walk from KL Sentral.

It is one of the cheapest outdoor parking bay you will find around KL Sentral area. It costs only RM2.10 for the first hour and RM2.10 for the subsequent hour thereof. The maximum parking rate is kept at RM7.40.

TimingParking Rate1st Hour or Part ThereofRM2.10Subsequent 1 Hour or Part ThereofRM2.10MaximumRM7.40

Outdoor Carpark Jalan Tun Sambanthan 4

The 24 hours operated outdoor carpark is located next to the junction in between Jalan Tun Sambanthan 4 and Jalan Sultan Abdul Samad. It is about 9 minutes walk to KL Sentral.

It costs only RM2.50 for the first hour and RM2.50 for the subsequent hour thereof. The maximum parking rate is be kept at RM15 per day.

TimingParking Rate1st Hour or Part ThereofRM2.50Subsequent 1 Hour or Part ThereofRM2.50Maximum Rate Per DayRM15.00

Citycarpark by DBKL (Parking Along the Road) in Brickfields area

Citycarpark (roadside parking) is also available in the Brickfields area. It provides a convenience service for on-street parking under Dewan Bandaraya Kuala Lumpur (DBKL). It costs RM1 for each hour and you only need to pay for the parking in between 7:30 am to 6:00 pm from Monday to Saturday. You can park for free on Sunday.
